class Configuration {
    var secretKey: string
    var clientAuthBase: string
    var djoserConfig: map<string, string>
    var databaseConfig: map<string, string>
    predicate ValidState()
    reads this
    {
        secretKey != "" &&
        clientAuthBase != "" &&
        |djoserConfig| > 0 &&
        |databaseConfig| > 0
    }
    constructor()
    ensures secretKey == ""
    ensures clientAuthBase == ""
    ensures djoserConfig == map[]
    ensures databaseConfig == map[]
    {
        secretKey := "";
        clientAuthBase := "";
        djoserConfig := map[];
        databaseConfig := map[];
    }
    method SetSecretKey(key: string)
    requires key != ""
    requires |djoserConfig| > 0 && |databaseConfig| > 0 && clientAuthBase != ""
    modifies this
    ensures secretKey == key
    ensures clientAuthBase == old(clientAuthBase)
    ensures djoserConfig == old(djoserConfig)
    ensures databaseConfig == old(databaseConfig)
    ensures ValidState()
    {
        secretKey := key;
    }
    method ConfigureDjoser(base: string)
    requires base != ""
    requires secretKey != "" && |databaseConfig| > 0
    modifies this
    ensures clientAuthBase == base
    ensures "PASSWORD_RESET_CONFIRM_URL" in djoserConfig && djoserConfig["PASSWORD_RESET_CONFIRM_URL"] == base + "/password/reset/confirm/{uid}/{token}"
    ensures "ACTIVATION_URL" in djoserConfig && djoserConfig["ACTIVATION_URL"] == base + "/activate/{uid}/{token}"
    ensures "SEND_ACTIVATION_EMAIL" in djoserConfig && djoserConfig["SEND_ACTIVATION_EMAIL"] == "false"
    ensures "SERIALIZERS_USER" in djoserConfig && djoserConfig["SERIALIZERS_USER"] == "base.serializers.UserSerializer"
    ensures secretKey == old(secretKey)
    ensures databaseConfig == old(databaseConfig)
    ensures ValidState()
    {
        clientAuthBase := base;
        
        var newConfig := map[
            "PASSWORD_RESET_CONFIRM_URL" := base + "/password/reset/confirm/{uid}/{token}",
            "ACTIVATION_URL" := base + "/activate/{uid}/{token}",
            "SEND_ACTIVATION_EMAIL" := "false",
            "SERIALIZERS_USER" := "base.serializers.UserSerializer"
        ];
        djoserConfig := newConfig;
    }
    method ConfigureDatabase(
        name: string, 
        user: string, 
        password: string, 
        host: string, 
        port: string
    )
    requires name != "" && user != "" && password != "" && host != "" && port != ""
    requires secretKey != "" && clientAuthBase != "" && |djoserConfig| > 0
    modifies this
    ensures "ENGINE" in databaseConfig && databaseConfig["ENGINE"] == "django.db.backends.postgresql"
    ensures "NAME" in databaseConfig && databaseConfig["NAME"] == name
    ensures "USER" in databaseConfig && databaseConfig["USER"] == user
    ensures "PASSWORD" in databaseConfig && databaseConfig["PASSWORD"] == password
    ensures "HOST" in databaseConfig && databaseConfig["HOST"] == host
    ensures "PORT" in databaseConfig && databaseConfig["PORT"] == port
    ensures secretKey == old(secretKey)
    ensures clientAuthBase == old(clientAuthBase)
    ensures djoserConfig == old(djoserConfig)
    ensures ValidState()
    {
        var newConfig := map[
            "ENGINE" := "django.db.backends.postgresql",
            "NAME" := name,
            "USER" := user,
            "PASSWORD" := password,
            "HOST" := host,
            "PORT" := port
        ];
        databaseConfig := newConfig;
    }
}

class Query {
  
  var author: string
  var body: string
  var displayName: string
  var id: string
  var name: string
  var description: string
  var timeCreated: string
  var timeModified: string
  var queryType: string
  
  
  predicate Valid()
    reads this
  {
    
    |author| > 0 &&
    |body| > 0 &&
    |displayName| > 0 &&
    |id| > 0 &&
    |name| > 0 &&
    |timeCreated| > 0 &&
    |timeModified| > 0 &&
    |queryType| > 0
  }
  
  constructor(
    author: string,
    body: string,
    displayName: string,
    id: string,
    name: string,
    description: string,
    timeCreated: string,
    timeModified: string,
    queryType: string)
    requires |author| > 0
    requires |body| > 0
    requires |displayName| > 0
    requires |id| > 0
    requires |name| > 0
    requires |timeCreated| > 0
    requires |timeModified| > 0
    requires |queryType| > 0
    ensures Valid()
    ensures this.author == author
    ensures this.body == body
    ensures this.displayName == displayName
    ensures this.id == id
    ensures this.name == name
    ensures this.description == description
    ensures this.timeCreated == timeCreated
    ensures this.timeModified == timeModified
    ensures this.queryType == queryType
  {
    this.author := author;
    this.body := body;
    this.displayName := displayName;
    this.id := id;
    this.name := name;
    this.description := description;
    this.timeCreated := timeCreated;
    this.timeModified := timeModified;
    this.queryType := queryType;
  }
  
  method UpdateDescription(newDescription: string)
    requires Valid()
    modifies this
    ensures Valid()
    ensures description == newDescription
    ensures author == old(author)
    ensures body == old(body)
    ensures displayName == old(displayName)
    ensures id == old(id)
    ensures name == old(name)
    ensures timeCreated == old(timeCreated)
    ensures timeModified == old(timeModified)
    ensures queryType == old(queryType)
  {
    description := newDescription;
  }
}
